tabs.title: Welcome to the block editor
tabs.text: In the WordPress editor, each paragraph, image, or video is presented as a distinct “block” of content.

tabs.title: Make each block your own
tabs.text: Each block comes with its own set of controls for changing things like color, width, and alignment. These will show and hide automatically when you have a block selected.

tabs.title: Get to know the block library
tabs.text: All of the blocks available to you live in the block library. You’ll find it wherever you see the inserter icon.

tabs.title: Learn how to use the block editor
tabs.text: New to the block editor? Want to learn more about using it? Here's a detailed guide.
